title: Dred Scott v. Sanford | Summary & Decision
note: Note that these are not in order

questions.question: How did many Northerners respond to the Dred Scott decision?
questions.answer: They were furious and protested the Supreme Court's pro-South bias.

questions.question: Which of the following is FALSE of Dred Scott?
questions.answer: In 1846, Dred Scott was sold to Dr. John Emerson.

questions.question: What is true of the case Dred Scott vs E.I Emerson?
questions.answer: The Missouri Supreme Court sent the Scotts back into slavery.

questions.question: The U.S. Supreme Court ruled that _____.
Which argument was used by the Scotts in 1846 during their court case against Mrs Emerson?
questions.answer: That they had lived in a free state and territory and they were already free.
